name: proceed-dashboard-monorepo
description: PROCEED Portfolio Management Dashboard - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd backend && npm ci
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.copy:frontend: cp fareye-b2b-project-update-enhanced.html dist/public/index.html && cp dashboard-bind.js dist/public/ && cp -r project_update_*.json dist/public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.production.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.postinstall: npm run prisma:generate || echo 'Skipping Prisma generation'

author: PROCEED Team
